title: US Republican senator pushes bill to end dual citizenship
description: US Senator Bernie Moreno has introduced a bill that seeks to eliminate dual citizenship in the country Read Full Article at RT.com
content: US Senator Bernie Moreno has introduced a bill to eliminate dual citizenship in the country. Under the proposed ‘Exclusive Citizenship Act of 2025’ unveiled on Monday, anyone with dual citizenship wo… [+2141 chars]
